channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: « Il manque quelque chose en dessous de la C3 » : on a discuté avec le patron de Citroën de ses projets de voitures électriques ultra-abordables
item.description: Outre l'abandon du « tout-électrique » en 2035, la Commission européenne a ouvert la voie à une nouvelle catégorie de voitures électriques bien plus abordables qu'aujourd'hui. Un marché qui intéresse fortement Citroën, comme nous l'a confirmé son nouveau PDG, Xavier Chardon, lors d'un entretien.

item.title: Passwords are still a problem for UK businesses - what next?
item.description: The challenge for British security leaders is no longer whether NCSC guidance on credential management is sound, but how to operationalize it effectively.

item.title: Got a Nespresso machine? You need to try these 3 delicious coffee pods right now – while you still can
item.description: Add these three exciting flavours to your next order – you won't regret it.

item.title: This is the year of wireless speakers as design pieces — here are 6 I loved from CES 2026 and can't wait to hear more about
item.description: My favorite speakers from CES 2026 that look good as they sound (hopefully)

item.title: La manette BackBone One Gen 2 version Lightning est à moitié prix pendant les soldes
item.description: Vous jouez sur iPhone et vous êtes encore branché au port Lightning ? La Backbone One Gen 2 édition PlayStation profite de la seconde démarque des soldes avec une remise de plus de 50 %, faisant chuter son prix de 120,99 euros à 57,59 euros à la Fnac.

item.title: iPhone 18 Pro video leak gives us a look at the phone's potential design and colors – here's what's changing
item.description: A detailed video laying out the upgrades we can expect from the iPhone 18 Pro has appeared online.

item.title: Here are the 10 deals worth grabbing from Best Buy’s winter sales event
item.description: Good deals are often hard to come by at the beginning of the year — which is precisely what makes Best Buy’s Winter Sale worth checking out. The ongoing sales event features discounts on everything from big-ticket OLED TVs to smaller electronics, including fitness trackers that can help you achieve your New Year’s resolutions. There […]

item.title: The Eureka Ergonomic GTG Wave gaming desk looks fancy, and feels great for PC gaming — but you'll probably want a desk mat
item.description: Eureka Ergonomic's GTG Wave desk is as premium-feeling as it is stylish, even if the glass top means you'll need to be a little careful with it.

item.title: Lavazza's A Modo Mio Deséa makes delicious espresso and a decent cappuccino – if you use the right milk
item.description: This little capsule coffee maker is whisper-quiet and compact enough to find a home in even the smallest kitchen, but its milk system holds it back.

item.title: Forget Landman season 3 — I pitched Ali Larter the Taylor Sheridan spinoff I'm desperate to see on Paramount+, and she's 100% 'game'
item.description: We've got no idea how long the wait will be until Paramount+ airs the now-confirmed Landman season 3, but never fear... I've got the perfect spinoff idea in mind.

item.title: Kaoss Pad V is the first major upgrade to Korg’s touch-based effects in 13 years
item.description: The Kaoss Pad has seen many different iterations, but the mainline effect unit and sampler hasn't received an update since the launch of the KP3+ in 2013. Korg has finally given it the attention it deserves with the release of the Kaoss Pad V. Rather than a dramatic reimagining of what a Kaoss Pad is, […]
